tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE flexible_work_arrangements (
  id INT,
  employee_name VARCHAR(50),
  department VARCHAR(50),
  work_arrangement_type VARCHAR(50),
  communication_rating INT,
  collaboration_rating INT
);

CREATE TABLE team_collaboration (
	team_id INT NOT NULL,
	team_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
	flexible_work_arrangement BOOLEAN NOT NULL,
	team_size INT,
	PRIMARY KEY (team_id)
);

CREATE TABLE communication_history (
	message_id INT NOT NULL,
	team_id INT NOT NULL,
	message_content VARCHAR(1000) NOT NULL,
	communication_date DATE NOT NULL,
	PRIMARY KEY (message_id),
	FOREIGN KEY (team_id) REFERENCES team_collaboration(team_id)
);

CREATE TABLE impact_of_flexible_work_arrangements (
    employee_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    team_id INT,
    work_hours INT,
    communication_rating INT,
    collaboration_rating INT
);

CREATE TABLE communication_data (
    employee_id INT,
    communication_channel VARCHAR(50),
    message_count INT,
    message_sent_date TIMESTAMP,
    FOREIGN KEY (employee_id) REFERENCES impact_of_flexible_work_arrangements(employee_id)
);

CREATE TABLE TeamCommunication (
    conversation_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    start_date DATETIME,
    end_date DATETIME,
    initiated_by INT,
    conversation_topic VARCHAR(255)
);

CREATE TABLE WorkArrangements (
    arrangement_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    member_id INT,
    start_date DATETIME,
    end_date DATETIME,
    arrangement_type VARCHAR(50)
);

CREATE TABLE CollaborationMetrics (
    metric_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    conversation_id INT,
    arrangement_id INT,
    messages_sent INT,
    calls_made INT
);
